author: cbegin
msg: Uncovered a new bug: If nested result map has empty rowset (i.e. no results) then the parent of the resultMap will not be loaded.  E.g. is A has many B, and if B is empty, then A won't be loaded.

author: elecharny
msg: When we receive a modification request with no ModificationItem, just return instead of writing the same entry again (RFC 4511 says that the modification must be ignored)

author: elecharny
msg: o Transform some of the ldfi keywords to lowercase (changeType -> changetype).
